sentences.english: We should establish a customer demands value-driven distribution intellectual model.
sentences.chinese: 應建立以顧客的需求價值爲核心的營銷心智模式。

sentences.english: To your mind, it looks like an ocean, but they are dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 對你的心智而言，它看起來條是海洋，但他們是次元。

sentences.english: Her mind has lost its spring.
Archangel Michael is the Angel of Miracles who strengthens the spirit during difficult times or dangerous situations.
sentences.chinese: 大天使麥可是在艱難或危險時刻強化心智的奇蹟天使。

sentences.english: They strike me as less intellectually adventurous than the Yale students of today.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得他們與如今的耶魯學生相比心智沒有那麼活躍。

sentences.english: Day didn't drop in my case, so bitter I mind, labor I bones and muscles.
sentences.chinese: 天沒降大任於我，照樣苦我心智，勞我筋骨。

sentences.english: Humans also have the mental capacity to make decisions not based on impulse.
sentences.chinese: 人類也有着不根據衝動而依靠心智作出決定的能力。

sentences.english: Remember, to truly understand Ultimate Reality you
sentences.chinese: 記住，要真正領會終極實相，你得走出你的心智。

sentences.english: Any preoccupation with ideas of what is right or wrong in conduct shows an arrested intellectual development.
sentences.chinese: 耽於權衡舉止的孰是孰非，是心智發展受困的表現。

sentences.english: Drinking a Little comforts a day, but being used to hitting the bottle will paralyse all your senses.
sentences.chinese: 小酒宜情，但是酗酒成性會麻痹你所有的心智。

sentences.english: It was through the power of his mind that Hanuman leapt over the sea.
sentences.chinese: 哈曼奴也是通常心智的力量去橫渡海洋。

sentences.english: Your mind and various emotions are employed as the mediators between the two.
sentences.chinese: 你的心智和各種不同的情感受僱於二者間的調停角色。

sentences.english: Mastering this will help you have a better control over your mind and body.
sentences.chinese: 掌握這些可以幫助你更好地控制你的心智和身體。

sentences.english: This suggests there are some possible mental exercises that might do that.
sentences.chinese: 這建議有可能做那的一些可能的心智練習。

sentences.english: It expands the mind, sharpens the perceptions, and ripens the judgment.
sentences.chinese: 這種操練能使心智發達，理解力增強，鑑別力熟練。

sentences.english: But inside the Grand Guignol, disturbed minds were at work.
sentences.chinese: 但是進入大木偶劇場，我們的心智就開始亂了。
